body_content.explanation: in a way that relates to the process or skill of writing music:
examples: "Dragons" is the most compositionally ambitious track on the album.
The two pieces are quite similar compositionally.

body_content.explanation: in a way that relates to the way things are arranged in a picture:
examples: This is one of her most compositionally complex paintings.
Compositionally, the drawings in the collection are quite simple.

body_content.explanation: in a way that relates to the parts, substances, etc. that form something:
examples: The lower layer is compositionally similar to rocks found in the north of the island.
When viewed under a microscope, the cells were compositionally alike.
